Hello World出力.title: Hello World Output
Hello World出力.question: Write a Go program that outputs the string "Hello, World!".

2つの数値の合計.title: Sum of Two Numbers
2つの数値の合計.question: Assign two integers (10 and 20) to variables and calculate and output their sum.

文字列を連結して挨拶.title: Concatenate Strings for Greeting
文字列を連結して挨拶.question: Define variable name := "Alice" and output "Hello, Alice!".

数値が正か負かゼロか判定.title: Determine if Number is Positive, Negative, or Zero
数値が正か負かゼロか判定.question: There is a variable num := -5. If this number is positive, output "Positive"; if negative, output "Negative"; if 0, output "Zero".

1から5まで出力.title: Output Numbers from 1 to 5
1から5まで出力.question: Use a for loop to output numbers from 1 to 5, each on a new line.

forループで合計計算.title: Calculate Sum with For Loop
forループで合計計算.question: Define variables sum := 0 and i := 1, and use a for loop to add i to sum while i is 5 or less, then output the final sum value.

スライスの要素を出力.title: Output Slice Elements
スライスの要素を出力.question: Declare an integer slice []int{10, 20, 30, 40, 50} and output each element separated by commas on one line.

関数で2つの数を足す.title: Add Two Numbers with Function
関数で2つの数を足す.question: Create a function add(a int, b int) int that returns the sum of two integers. Call it from main with 5 and 10 and output the result.

スライスの最大値を求める.title: Find Maximum Value in Slice
スライスの最大値を求める.question: Find and output the maximum value from integer slice []int{15, 42, 8, 27, 33}.

曜日の判定.title: Determine Day of Week
曜日の判定.question: There is a variable day := 1. Use a switch statement to output the corresponding day name. 1=Monday, 2=Tuesday, ..., 7=Sunday. If it doesn't match, output "Invalid day".

複数の値を返す関数.title: Function Returning Multiple Values
複数の値を返す関数.question: Create a function divide(a int, b int) (int, int) that returns the quotient and remainder. Output the result of 10÷3.

ポインタで値を変更.title: Change Value with Pointer
ポインタで値を変更.question: Create a function double(n *int) that doubles the passed value. Pass 5 from main and output the changed value.

マップに追加と取得.title: Add and Get from Map
マップに追加と取得.question: Create a map[string]int, add "age" -> 25, and output the value of "age".

構造体の定義と使用.title: Define and Use Struct
構造体の定義と使用.question: Define a Person struct with Name(string) and Age(int), create an instance with "John", 25, and output the name.

メソッドの定義.title: Define Method
メソッドの定義.question: Add a GetName() string method to the Person struct that returns the name.

文字列の長さを取得.title: Get String Length
文字列の長さを取得.question: Get and output the length of string "Hello Go".

文字列を分割.title: Split String
文字列を分割.question: Split string "apple,banana,orange" by comma and output each element on a separate line.

1から10の偶数を出力.title: Output Even Numbers from 1 to 10
1から10の偶数を出力.question: Output only even numbers from 1 to 10, separated by commas.

インターフェースの実装.title: Implement Interface
インターフェースの実装.question: Define a speak() string method in Speaker interface, implement it in Dog struct, and return "Woof!".

エラーハンドリング.title: Error Handling
エラーハンドリング.question: Create divide(a, b int) (int, error) that returns an error if b=0. Call 10÷0 and output the error message.

goroutineの使用.title: Using goroutine
goroutineの使用.question: Create a function print5times(msg string) that outputs a message 5 times. Execute it concurrently using the go keyword. Output "Go".

チャネルでデータ送受信.title: Send and Receive Data with Channel
チャネルでデータ送受信.question: Create a chan int, send value 42, receive it, and output it.

rangeでスライスを走査.title: Iterate Slice with range
rangeでスライスを走査.question: Iterate slice []int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5} with range and output them separated by commas.

可変長引数.title: Variable Arguments
可変長引数.question: Create sum(nums ...int) int that returns the sum of all arguments. Pass 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and output the result.

無名関数.title: Anonymous Function
無名関数.question: Create a function that multiplies two numbers using an anonymous function, and output the result of multiplying 5 and 6.

クロージャ.title: Closure
クロージャ.question: Create counter() func() int that returns a function that increments the count each time it's called. Call it 3 times and output the final value.

型アサーション.title: Type Assertion
型アサーション.question: Assign integer 42 to a variable of interface{} type, extract it as int type using type assertion, and output it.

型スイッチ.title: Type Switch
型スイッチ.question: Create a function that takes an interface{} argument and returns "Integer" if int type, "String" if string type. Pass 42 and output the result.

appendでスライスに追加.title: Add to Slice with append
appendでスライスに追加.question: Add 4 and 5 to slice []int{1, 2, 3} and output them separated by commas.

Continue文で3の倍数をスキップ.title: Skip Multiples of 3 with Continue Statement
Continue文で3の倍数をスキップ.question: Output numbers from 1 to 10 except multiples of 3, separated by commas. Use the continue statement.

Break文で5以上でループを終了.title: Exit Loop at 5 or Above with Break Statement
Break文で5以上でループを終了.question: Loop from 1 to 10, and exit the loop when reaching 5. Output numbers 1 to 4 separated by commas.

配列の使用.title: Using Array
配列の使用.question: Declare a fixed-length array [5]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5} and output the elements separated by commas.

文字列を置換.title: Replace String
文字列を置換.question: Replace "Go" with "World" in string "Hello Go" and output it.

文字列を大文字に変換.title: Convert String to Uppercase
文字列を大文字に変換.question: Convert string "hello world" to uppercase and output it.

文字列に部分文字列が含まれるか確認.title: Check if String Contains Substring
文字列に部分文字列が含まれるか確認.question: Check if string "Hello Go" contains "Go". If found, output "Found"; if not, output "Not found".

文字列フォーマット.title: String Formatting
文字列フォーマット.question: Use fmt.Sprintf() to create and output the string "Name: John, Age: 25".

再帰で階乗を計算.title: Calculate Factorial with Recursion
再帰で階乗を計算.question: Create a recursive function factorial(n int) int and calculate and output the factorial of 5 (120).

init関数.title: init Function
init関数.question: Output "Init" in init function and "Main" in main.

空のインターフェース.title: Empty Interface
空のインターフェース.question: Assign string "Hello" to a variable of interface{} type and output it.
